entry.def: If something is contaminated by dirt, chemicals, or radiation, they make it dirty or harmful.

example.ex: Have any fish been contaminated in the Arctic Ocean?
example.tran: 北冰洋的鱼受到过污染吗？

example.ex: ...vast tracts of empty land, much of it contaminated by years of army activity.
example.tran: 大片撂荒的土地，其中大部分由于经年累月的战火而受到了污染

means.word_mean: 3. the act of contaminating or polluting; including (either intentionally or accidentally) unwanted substances or factors

auth_sentence.content: The issue now is how did this contamination happen?
auth_sentence.res_content: The issue now is how did this contamination happen?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The issue now is how did this contamination happen?

auth_sentence.content: That will be the major source of the contamination.
auth_sentence.res_content: That will be the major source of the contamination.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That will be the major source of the contamination.

auth_sentence.content: Lobins places responsibility for the contamination squarely on Cabot.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lobins places responsibility for the contamination squarely on Cabot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lobins places responsibility for the contamination squarely on Cabot.

sentences.en: tests for pesticide contamination in food
sentences.cn: 对食物中农药污染的检验

sentences.en: There is already a high level of environmental contamination.
sentences.cn: 环境污染的程度已经很高。

sentences.en: Wash everything thoroughly to avoid contamination with bacteria.
sentences.cn: 把所有东西都彻底洗净以避免细菌污染。

sentences.en: Always keep food covered to prevent contamination by flies.
sentences.cn: 时常把食物盖着以防苍蝇污染。

sentences.en: There is a danger of serious contamination from radioactive waste.
sentences.cn: 放射性废弃物有严重污染的危险。

sentences.en: We must ensure our children against contamination by bad ideas.
sentences.cn: 我们必须保护我们的儿童不受坏思想的侵蚀。

sentences.en: houses made uninhabitable by radioactive contamination
sentences.cn: 受放射性污染物影响而不适合居住的房子
